name: Heart Work
description:
Rules are simple:

  • Collect pearls with heart.
  • Piranhas hurt players and heart.
  • Ravens hurt only heart.
  • Spawn time increases with every death.
  • The game gets more difficult in time!

You will need:
1 keyboard
2-6 players


Survive longest, score highest!


Made by Anil Demir for Ludum Dare 40.
Please leave a comment and tell me what you think :)

Recent:
- Camera shake, zoom and music pitch effects on negative stuff.
- New images on main menu and game over screen (to be animated later)
- Increased pull force between players by a lot
- Fixed bugs with bandage mechanic
- Fixed bug of sound effects cutting each other
